data.title: Nigeria states, slogan, year created and more…
data.meta_description: The Nigeria states which consists of 6 states as at 1967 has over the years grown to 36 states and one Federal Capital territory of Abuja that acts as the seat of power for the Nigerian people. State like Cross Rivers, Kaduna, Kano, Kwara, Lagos and River states were created on the 27th of May,…
